Interface CustomerDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface CustomerDao
    Interfaz de la capa DAO para el modelo de Customer
    Version:
    29/08/19
    Author:
    dcabanas
    See Also:
    How to use Spring JDBC Template with Spring Boot for Postgres DataBase
